examples: They have appointed a new head teacher at my son's school.
Han nombrado a un nuevo director en la escuela de mi hijo.
She has recently been appointed to the committee.
Recientemente ha sido nombrada miembro del comité.
They appointed him (as) captain of the English team.
Lo nombraron (como) capitán de la selección inglesa.
She's been appointed British ambassador to the UN.
Ha sido nombrada embajadora británica ante la ONU.
